text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) 
(No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 12th day of April

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid 19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 
2020) to provide for an increase in the fine amount for travel to a port or airport 
for the purposes of leaving the State without reasonable excuse from €500 to 
€2,000 from 12 April 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 5
